DISPLAY ONLY. No Incentivized, No content locking, no VC. No distribution through adware or spyware. No distribution on sites for children under 13. No distribution on sites owned, operated or managed by Mindspark or any of it's affiliated companies. 
Valid lead criteria: user downloads and installs the product. Pixel fires upon successful installation. 
Browsers: IE and FF only. This application is not compliant with other browsers.
All creatives must be approved by the advertiser. The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Adsmarket representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives. All creatives (even if previously approved by the advertiser) must include the relevant IAC product's logo. The borders (frames) of all banners must be visible to the viewer, and cannot blend into the background of the site where it is displayed. No mention of Hulu is permitted. No duplicate IPs.  

Pubs are NOT allowed to mention any reference of "Elf Yourself" in any of client's ads, ad copy or landing pages for any of the products as this is a trademarked name.
Mindspark offers are not to be advertised via PageRage or any of it's affiliates
Advertising is not allowed on firstrowsports.eu. Please see guidelines for full list of sites to blacklist. 
Ads cannot be placed so that they are covering/on top of media players.  
Ads are not allowed to reference any text/content offering special access to premium content/materials, or to live broadcast TV.
No GDN. No SEM. Facebook traffic of any kind is not allowed. A publisher who will use Facebook to promote this program will not be compensated for generated commissions and will risk suspension from Matomy Market

GDN is allowed as long as creatives/texts are provided by/approved by the advertiser.

No torrents or peer-to-peer traffic.

program.name: Descargo ES Non incent WAP
program.description:
Italia Explorer es uno de los líderes en entretenimiento móvil del mercado, y te ofrece los mejores sorteos para conseguir fantásticos premios como grandes sumas de dinero, cruceros, viajes con increíbles destinos, móviles de última generación, la tecnología más puntera, etc.

Flow:

 1.       El usuario debe hacer clic primero en alguno de nuestros banners que aparecen en los sites de Internet.

2.       En cuanto el usuario cliquea en el banner, le aparece nuestra landing (la URL que te envío)

3.       El usuario debe introducir su número de teléfono para conseguir acceder a los siguientes pasos.

4.       Al introducir el número de teléfono y cliquear en el botón de continuar, aparece el segundo paso con una landing en la que el usuario debe introducir el código PIN que ha debido recibir en su mensajería del teléfono.

5.       Al introducir el código pin y cliquear en el botón pasa a la Thank You Page en la que la suscripción se ha realizado con éxito.

Pin code flow: User click on banner > LP > Type telephone number > Receive an SMS with a pin code > insert pin code in the box > User subscribed.

program.description:
Offer review:
Rail Nation combines an in-depth transport simulation with a refines strategy game in charming
graphics. As founder of a railroad company the user can turn a sleepy town with historical steam train into a vibrant metropolis with electric railways. It is the players goal to transport as many goods as possible through six historic railroad eras, to interact with other players and to built up their own railroad network. The player has the chance to be the most influential tycoon with the best strategy within the endgame.

User Flow:
DOI
1. The user starts in the www.rail-nation.com
home page and clicks on “Register Now”
button. After clicking on the button, the
system takes him/her to the registration
form.
2. In the registration form, the user enters a
player name, e-mail address and a
password. After clicking on the “Register” button, the
user is sent an activation e-mail.
3. When the user clicks on the link in the
activation e-mail, or fills in the activation
code on himself, he / she is sent to the
website and receives a message that the
activation was successful.
3.1. The partner tracking pixel is
triggered at the moment of
activation.
The relevant entry can be found in
the source code for the HTML
page.

Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.
Negative list: Bigpoint Actionliga FussballManager XBlaster F1Manager Dark Orbit IceFighter Germanys Next Topmodel Mafia1930 Spaceinvasion Gladiatoren Chaoscars Deine11 Parsec Managergames Hockey Gladiatoren 2 The-Pimps Damoria Managergames Soccer Robofighter Land of Destruction Fragoria Seafight Gladius 2 The Mafia Glorykings Starpet PopstarsTheGame Speedcars Farmerama Battlestar Galactica Online Zoomumba War Of Titans Crimejacks Deepolis Hellblades Maestia Warstory Ponyrama Emporea Gangs of Crime Gangs of Crime 1930 Ruined Online Toon Racer BeBees Drakensang Online
Example of bookings which are not allowed: Bigpoint Big point Big-point Bgpont
If campaigns are being run for competitors who are on the negative list, it is forbidden to show Bigpoint games or to link directly to www.bigpoint.com or any of the Bigpoint games on the landing page of the corresponding search request.
